name: Add new Surveybot responses to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time there is a new response in Surveybot, Make will automatically add a new row in Google Sheets spreadsheet for that response. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MyvsDU3ShjHZls1hpgHeBXZs7Y2dTj0rEUvOdXNZICM/edit?usp=sharing).
